item.title: Moving to Wayland! Login shell lambasting
item.description: The problem I have been trying to move to Wayland for the past year. The call of gestures, less artifacting and just the hype had me spell bound. The problem was, GNOME, my DE of choice, decided to make what I think is the asinine choice to not start the DE in a login shell. All this meant was my .profile never runs and my nix environment never get set up.
